PlayOrDiscardLeaders(int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.messages.ActionMessage

PlayOrDiscardLeaders(int, GameStatusUpdate, Client) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
method that handles the action playOrDiscardLeader.
PlayOrDiscardLeaders(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
method that handles the interaction when playing or discarding a leader, and call all the logic methods that perform the action requested (or deny it)

the method also sends back a message stating which state the controller ended with. there can be 4 different types of states
"1" means that the leader has been discarded correctly
"0" means that the leader has been played correcly
"2" means that the player does not meet the conditions to play the leader (meaning that they can play them in the future)
"3" means that the player has already played or discarded the leader, meaning that they can't play them again
playOrDiscardLeadersLogic(int[]) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.singlePlayer.controller.SinglePlayerHandler
logic for the play or discard a leader action.

popeCardsStatus() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.FaithTrack
method that is used to update the status inside a PlayerUpdate

note that the method does NOT signal a difference between discarded and not reached zones, the only difference that is reported is if the card has been acquired or not.
